column4: Is there a way to completely remove pulseaudio without removing the "ubuntu-desktop" meta package?
let me look 4 it on a blog, www.korben.info
ok, i've found the how to, but it's in french
but it shows line by line commands?
and if I reinstall ubuntu-desktop, it will add pulseaudio as a dependency.
arrrff!!! it's not the good tuto
I will see what happens if I remove ubuntu-desktop as well.
